api_list.name: getStoreExtended

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the Store

optional_parameters.name: partner_code
optional_parameters.description: the partner code, if this parameter is set then 'store_id' is the partner store ID, if 'partner_code' is not set then 'store_id' is the Movylo store ID

account_id.description: The id of the merchant account who owns of the store, required for creation then read only

code.description: The affiliation code (if any), set in creation then read only

country.description: The country code (in the two-letter ISO standard 3166-1 alpha-2)

creation_date.description: The creation date in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd', read only

currency.description: The currency code (in the three-letter ISO standard ISO 4217)

expiration_date.description: The expiration date in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd', ignored for creation; use it to temporary suspend a store that can be re-activated calling the 'Set Plan' API

external_store_id.description: The Movylo partner Store Id (if any), set in creation then read only

partner_code.description: The Movylo partner code (if any), if provided you must use it when you create the store

plan_id.description: The plan id of the store

store_id.description: The id of the store, ignored for creation but required for update

store_name.description: The name of the store, required for creation (must be equal-less than 25 characters)

store_name_url.description: The 'urlified' name of the store, used to assemble the store frontend url, read only

customers_max.description: the maximum number of managed customers (depending from the plan)

customers_total.description: the current number of managed customers

store_url.description: the url of the store frontend url

optional_parameters.name: partner_code

optional_parameters.name: event_code
optional_parameters.description: the event codes, if this parameter is set then `account_id` is the partner `account ID` if `partner_code` is not set then `account_id` is the Movylo merchant account ID

optional_parameters.name: search_string

about_page.description: the "About" page of the store, in HTML

contact_page.description: the "Contact us" page of the store, in HTML

privacy_page.description: the "Privacy" page of the store, in HTML

tos_page.description: the "Terms of service" page of the store, in HTML

api_list.name: getCustomers
api_list.description: Get customers by the customer account_id or by a search string (on fields 'email', 'phone', 'first_name', 'last_name' and 'loyalty_code')

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the Movylo store where the customer is

optional_parameters.name: account_id
optional_parameters.description: Id of the Store's customer account, if 'search_string' is not used only the customer with this account id will be returned otherwise this will be ignored and will be performed a search

optional_parameters.name: search_string
optional_parameters.description: string to perform customer search, search is performed on fields 'email', 'phone', 'first_name', 'last_name' and 'loyalty_code' if this field is set will be performed a serach and the 'account_id' field will be ignored

api_list.name: getMoreMerchant

optional_parameters.name: event_code
optional_parameters.description: the event codes, if this parameter is set then `account_id` is the partner `account ID` if `partner_code` is not set then `account_id` is the Movylo merchant account ID

optional_parameters.name: partner_code
optional_parameters.description: the partner code, if this parameter is set then `account_id` is the partner `account ID` if `partner_code` is not set then `account_id` is the Movylo merchant account ID

api_list.name: getCustomerCoupons

required_parameters.name: account_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the Store's customer account

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the Movylo store where the customer is

amount.description: the amount of the order (only for type 'ORDER')

creation_date.description: the coupon creation date in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'

expiration_date.description: the coupon expiration date in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'

status.description:
Status of the coupon:
 * `BOOKED` - for coupon type 'ORDER', it means the coupon is  reserved but not paid yet
 * `PAID` - for coupon type 'ORDER', it means the coupon is paid but not get/used yet
 * `VALID` - for coupon type 'DISCOUNT' and 'REWARD', it means the coupon is not used yet
 * `REDEEMED` - for all coupon types, it means the coupon is paid and already used, not valid anymore
 * `UNKNOWN` - the order is expired

store_name.description: the store name the coupon is related to

sub_type.description:
The coupon sub_type, only for coupon of type 'DISCOUNT':
 * `ABSOLUTE` - the discount in in absolute terms
 * `PERCENTAGE` - the the discount is in percentage terms

type.description:
Status of the coupon:
 * `ORDER` - the coupon is related to a purchase
 * `DISCOUNT` - the coupon is a percentage discount (i.e. 25% discount) or absolute discount (i.e. $5 discount)
 * `REWARD` - the coupon is a gift for the consumer

api_list.name: getCouponStatus
api_list.description: Check a coupons status by the store_id and the coupon code

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the Movylo store where the customer is

required_parameters.name: coupon_code
required_parameters.description: code of the coupon to check

discount.status_description: The Product hasnt been paid yet

amount.description: the amount of the order (only for type 'ORDER')

account_id.description: the id of the customer account, not used for creation

birth_date.description: birth date of the customer (in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd')

email.description: email of the customer, unique within the store, required if 'phone' is not set

loyalty_code.description: code of the loyalty customer membership (can't be written but only read)

loyalty_points.description: number of loyalty points (can't be written but only read)

phone.description: phone of the customer, unique within the store, required if 'email' is not set

source.description: number of loyalty points (can't be written but only read)

date.description: the date of the order in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss' (only for type 'ORDER')

description.description: the textual description of the coupon

order_id.description: the ID of the order (only for type 'ORDER')

status.description:
Status of the coupon:
 * `BOOKED` - for coupon type 'ORDER', it means the coupon is  reserved but not paid yet
 * `PAID` - for coupon type 'ORDER', it means the coupon is paid but not get/used yet
 * `VALID` - for coupon type 'DISCOUNT' and 'REWARD', it means the coupon is not used yet
 * `REDEEMED` - for all coupon types, it means the coupon is paid and already used, not valid anymore
 * `UNKNOWN` - the order is expired

status_description.description: the textual description of the coupon status

sub_type.description:
The coupon sub_type, only for coupon of type 'DISCOUNT':
 * `ABSOLUTE` - the discount in in absolute terms
 * `PERCENTAGE` - the the discount is in percentage terms

value.description: the value of the discount (only for type 'DISCOUNT' and 'REWARD')

type.description:
Status of the coupon:
 * `ORDER` - the coupon is related to a purchase
 * `DISCOUNT` - the coupon is a percentage discount (i.e. 25% discount) or absolute discount (i.e. $5 discount)
 * `REWARD` - the coupon is a gift for the consumer
